text: @michaelgove @MarosSefcovic You’re an idiot. Who cares about a date? I would rather the #UK got out of the coronavirus crisis alive than #brexit happened on time. You & Boz are so fixed by dates!Border down the Irish Sea won’t happen? Happened. You will change the date. You have to. A total complete fool!
